text:
Sakuya,
are you ready for the bus back soon?

Oh, I'm all set.
I can leave right away.

I see. You must be tired,
so make sure to rest when you get back.

Hehe, well, when I get back,
I've made plans to have tea with Mei.

Yeah, after stopping by the office once,
I just want to enjoy a bit more chatting with Mei.

Haha, I see. But since the training camp is over,
take it easy on yourselves.

I understand. I don't intend to talk for too long.
Mei also needs some rest.

That's right.
Have a good time.
